ROW.PDT: *IF ( ( *VALUE Linux_Machine_Information.Number_of_Processors_Online *EQ 1 *AND *VALUE KLZ_System_Statistics.System_Load_5min *GT 4.0 ) *OR ( *VALUE Linux_Machine_Information.Number_of_Processors_Online *EQ 2 *AND *VALUE KLZ_System_Statistics.System_Load_5min *GT 8 ) *OR ( *VALUE Linux_Machine_Information.Number_of_Processors_Online *EQ 3 *AND *VALUE KLZ_System_Statistics.System_Load_5min *GT 12 ) *OR ( *VALUE Linux_Machine_Information.Number_of_Processors_Online *EQ 4 *AND *VALUE KLZ_System_Statistics.System_Load_5min *GT 16 ) *OR ( *VALUE Linux_Machine_Information.Number_of_Processors_Online *EQ 6 *AND *VALUE KLZ_System_Statistics.System_Load_5min *GT 24 ) *OR ( *VALUE Linux_Machine_Information.Number_of_Processors_Online *EQ 8 *AND *VALUE KLZ_System_Statistics.System_Load_5min *GT 32 ) *OR ( *VALUE Linux_Machine_Information.Number_of_Processors_Online *GE 16 *AND *VALUE KLZ_System_Statistics.System_Load_5min *GT 64 ))
